text: He climbed the stairs, eager to unload the guilt-symbol upon the ticket-collector and then to emerge carrying his shame unseen, but burning, into the night. He reached the barrier and fumbled for his contract before thrusting the briefcase at the ticket-collector with the firm intention of playing the dutiful citizen retrieving lost property.
handwritten_text: He climbed the stairs, eager to unload the guilt-symbol upon the ticket-collector and then to emerge carrying his shame unseen, but burning, into the night. He reached the barrier and fumbled for his contract before thrusting the briefcase at the ticket-collector with the firm intention of playing the dutiful citizen retrieving lost property.
